row.process:
:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#) :IF &LENGTH# > 1 : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) :ELSE : SET &END_CHAR# = "" :ENDIF
:WHILE HEX(&END_CHAR#) = "0A" : SET &LENGTH# = &LENGTH# - 1 : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, 1, &LENGTH#) : IF &LENGTH# > 0 : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) : ENDIF :ENDWHILE
